summary: Boney M. is a music group formed in 1974 by German producer Frank Farian. They blend R&B, reggae, funk, and disco, and became popular during the disco era of the 1970s. The original members were from Jamaica, Montserrat, Aruba, and West Germany. Though their lineup has changed since the 1980s, Boney M. has sold millions of records worldwide. Their biggest hits include "Daddy Cool," "Ma Baker," and "Rivers of Babylon."
title: Boney M.
